body.name: [Upgraded] USB Computer /Laptop Speaker with Stereo Sound & Enhanced Bass, Portable Mini Sound Bar for Windows PCs, Desktop Computer and Laptops
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 46 mins
features: 🔊 Built-in Dual 3W High-Excursion Drivers and Passive Radiator that allow for louder sound, greater dynamic range, improved bass, and lower distortion. Note: There is no physical volume control on the speaker. But you can easily adjust the speaker volume on your computer.
🔌 One Cable for Both Audio & Power. No need for 3.5mm AUX jack, the single USB cable can feed both audio and electrical power for the USB computer speaker. Greatly help you avoid messy cable.
💻 Compatible with Windows PCs. The Upgraded USB Computer Speaker works great with various brands of Windows (Vista/7/8/10) PCs, such as HP, Lenovo, ASUS, Dell, Acer, LG or more.

💻 Compatible with Some MacOS & Chrome OS laptops as long as they had installed the latest audio driver for their sound card. Besides, this USB Speaker can even work for some Xbox and PlayStation 4 devices.

👍 Plug and Play, Very Easy to Use. Take Windows computer for example: Plug it into computer USB port — click the “Speaker” icon in the taskbar — select “USB Speaker” as your computer playback device. Then, the USB speaker is ready to work for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: [6W] USB Computer Speaker [8W] USB Computer Speaker [10W] USB Computer Speaker Speaker Power 6W (2*3W) 8W (2*4W) 10W (2*5W) Driver Size φ40mm φ45mm φ50mm Driver Type Hi-Magnetic Drivers Hi-Sensitive Drivers Hi-Fidelity Drivers Frequency Response 120Hz - 20kHz 110Hz - 20kHz 100Hz - 20kHz Bass Enhancement Passive Radiator Passive Radiator Dual Inverted Bass Port Volume Control x Buttons Digital Knob RGB Light x x ✓ Product Dimension 7.2 x 2.0 x 1.4 inch 7.2 x 2.2 x 1.8 inch 11 x 2.5 x 2.3 inch Product Weight 0.6 lb 0.8 lb 1.2 lb

[Upgraded] USB Computer Speakers for Desktop, Laptop, PC Key Features >Built-in dual 3W high-excursion drivers for full range audio. >Enhanced Bass with passive radiator. >Compatible with Windows(7/8/10/11) PC and desktop computer. >Compatible with macOS & Chrome OS laptops. >USB Plug-N-Play, very easy to use. Package List 1 x USB Computer Speaker 1 x User Manual
Surprisingly Loud Volume Built-in Dual Hi-Excursion Drivers and Passive Radiator, which deliver surprisingly loud volume and bass in such a compact PC speaker.

Saving Desktop Space It is perfect to put this small computer sound bar under the monitor. No Volume Buttons There is no volume control button on the computer speaker, all you need to do is to adjust the volume of media player and computer system.

Full Compatibility Compatible with Windows PCs The Upgraded USB Computer Speaker works great with various brands of Windows(7/8/10/11) PCs, such as HP, Lenovo, ThinkPad, ASUS, Dell, Samsung, Acer, LG or more. Compatible with macOS, Linux and Chrome OS laptops This laptop speaker will do a good job as an external computer speaker as long as you had installed the latest audio driver for the computer system.

Plug-N-Play, Very Easy to Use No need for installing drivers and 3.5mm headphone jack. Just plug the USB in and select “USB Audio/Device” for the sound output of your computer. Then, the USB speaker is OK to work for you.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Q: Is it compatible with Android TX-Box, TV, Projector, Monitor, Xbox, PStation, iPad or tablets? A: No. This USB speaker can only be used for computers. Because the USB ports of those devices do not have enough power to drive our speaker, which may result in not loud enough maximum volume. Q: Can I plug it into USB-Hub? A: Not recommended. The USB-hub has no enough power to drive our speaker, which may result-in cluttered, distorted or even constantly pops (audio cut-out) at high volume. Q: The volume is too low/loud, how can I adjust the speaker volume? A: All you need to do is to adjust the volume of the media player and computer system. Q: What's the problem if the speaker still “Doesn't Work” after plugged in? A1: Make sure that the USB port of your computer can work properly. A2: Make sure that you had selected "USB2.0 Device" as your computer sound output device. Q: Is there a built-in microphone? A: No. There is no built-in mic, so it is recommended to use a separate computer microphone when having video calls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High value, very easy to setup and use, not "studio" quality but didn't expect it to be.
reviews.reviewText: Likes: the price, ease of operation (plug into USB port for power and audio), small-ish size fits about anywhere. Just adjust the system volume control on the PC, no buttons on the speaker. Easy.Adequate: you hope for the best sound quality for the price, and I think this does give you that.Like any speaker powered by USB, it's not going to have a lot of amplification. It gets plenty loud for listening to podcasts or Internet music. You're not going to be buying this for studio quality sound. You get something with its own power supply for that and pay a good deal more. But these definitely serve their purpose and do what they say they do. I like the size of it, it fits about anywhere you would want it to. You just need to be within, whatever, 2 feet or whatever the length of the cable is, to a USB port on whatever PC you are using it with.Not disappointed with any aspect of the function or fit of this speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These create a separate audio system in windows
reviews.reviewText: I had a special need for these. I was building a retro arcade machine for a present and I needed speakers that were separate from the internal sound card of the laptop. Lots of technical reasons why, but a pair of "USB Powered" speakers wouldn't work. These show up as an additional audio device in Windows or Linux.I was hoping for two separate speakers to match the typical setup, but I made these work. A little Velcro mounting and some Alien Tape and they are not going anywhere. You can see the picture with the USB cable coming down from above and connecting into the USB Hub.They were still small enough to fit in the top of the arcade box. The sound is loud enough and clear enough to give a quality feeling to the sound. The bass is OK, but it's not going to be your thumping bass. Just fine for this situation.I was very happy with the speakers, quality was great, price point was perfect for my needs. If they provide an option for some lights and two separate speakers, I wouldn't complain as long as they kept this model as well. I'll be buying another pair for another retro gaming machine I'm working on now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Remarkable PC speaker
reviews.reviewText: Even though I had seen the photo on the listing, I didn't really grasp just how small this speaker was until I saw it in its box. I wondered what it could possibly sound like, and it didn't take long to find out. I placed it just behind my PC display and plugged the plenty long USB connecting cable in the rear of the OptiPlex unit. I quickly brought up a video on Edge and almost had my ears blown off (a bit of exaggeration) before I could turn the sound level down from initial full volume to around 60% using my mouse. The bass is naturally pretty thin but unless you are listening to something where bass is important, this little dynamo gets the job done. Decent sound, utter simplicity and very low cost. What's not to like? If it fits your needs, buy one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent sound, small, innocuous and easily installed
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my desktop when the last speakers developed a buzz. I plugged it into a USB, reset the output from monitor to USB, and it works fine. It's better sound than I'd expect from a simple, small, $20 speaker. If I want high fidelity I'll listen to my stereo. To mute or control the volume, you need to use the controls on your computer. That's as easy as the cord-mounted controls on my last speaker set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect to replace blown speakers in notebook
reviews.reviewText: Needed a USB speaker for use with a notebook that has blown speakers. This unit is compact, travels well and is simple to use. Sound quality is good (not outstanding) for something this size. Volume is OK if you are near the computer. It's not going to fill a large room, so if you want to turn your device into a party machine, look elsewhere. No volume control on the speaker itself, you must use your computer to control the volume. However, this is perfect for what I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sound in a Small Package
reviews.reviewText: My fancy computer monitor has the speakers on the back so the sound is terrible from the front. I ordered several USB speakers to address the issue. Of those purchased, this model was just what I was looking for. Great sound quality and nice size to fit on my desk.I loved it so much I ordered another one for my work PC.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good sound but not the volume control I would like
reviews.reviewText: This bar type speaker fits nicely behind my computer screen and has good enough sound. But there is a lack of volume control at the lower end of the volume. It is either too loud or too low. No in between. I have kept it, but a little displeased with that aspect. Sometimes I want an in between volume and it just doesn't have it. Either too loud or too low on the low end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for YouTube
reviews.reviewText: Just needed a speaker to hear YouTube videos. This works great and is a good value. The audio quality is acceptable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Get the best sound on your computer.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my tower computer, what a great investment. I searched a lot of the other products & decided to purchase this one & glad I did. I watch a lot of building model videos on youtube & the clarity & crispness of the sound is fantastic. Would recommend this for any computer. Great price & service.
Very happy with this purchase. Everything that was expected. Simple plug and play. Thankyou!
I'm happy with the speaker. The built-in speaker for the laptop is poor. This speaker is loud and clear. It's working for what I need it to.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound for something so small
reviews.reviewText: Great sound for something so small, just plugged into USB port and worked no issues.
